This final bill will complete a huge reduction in Federal government spending, as well as reduce the size of government and it's interference in our lives.

These measures will eliminate bloated public sector unions and reduce pension liabilities in the future. In addition, our public workforce will have more merit based incentives, creating a more efficient force.
The solution to this problem is threefold: we eliminate public sector unions, we establish merit based employment going forward, and we provide bonus opportunities based on an employee's performance.

We have a huge percentage of public, unionized workers in our nation. As those workers increase, so too does our public debt. In addition, these workers enjoy vast protections that private sector workers do not, meaning their employment is not merit based.
My fifth and final bill in the 5 Star plan is to Reform the State and Federal Workforce. https://t.co/tHfiK2pVRP

This is a first step in reducing the size and influence of our Federal government in our lives, and it is long overdue.
These are all bloated or unnecessary now, and will be more so after my first 3 bills are passed. Their functions can be either greatly reduced, or eliminated and moved to the State governments.

With my first 3 bills, the conditions to start reducing or eliminating Federal government departments have been created. Now it's time to cut federal programs, beginning with the IRS, the Department of Education, and the Department of Housing and Urban Development.

Our national debt has been out of control for years. We all complain about it, then we watch as both Dems AND GOP vote to increase it. On top of that, the Fed gov is becoming a larger percentage of our employment sector and producing nothing. This is unsustainable and must end.
Bill 4 of my plan focuses on Reducing the Size and Spending of the government. https://t.co/90ILmKeIZm

It is passed time to address our massive national debt and and stop using our tax system to attempt to control U.S citizens.

My solution: a Flat Tax with an Estate Tax Feature. Everyone pays, and everyone pays the same. This rewards productive behavior, eliminates loopholes, and stimulates employment and manufacturing among many other benefits.

Currently, we've got a taxing system that punishes productive people and is easy to manipulate by the government in order to control behavior. We also don't have a tax system geared to pay for our expenses like it was supposed to.
My second bill in this series tackles our labyrinthine tax system. https://t.co/iIWi4R7a6y
